医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
犰狳案例：它是否在佛罗里达州传播麻风病？在佛罗里达大学边缘的一个露天谷仓里，兽医胡安·坎波斯·克劳尔检查一只死去的犰狳的脚垫和耳朵是否有感染迹象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/The-case-of-the-armadillo-Is-it-spreading-leprosy-in-Florida.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/The-case-of-the-armadillo-Is-it-spreading-leprosy-in-Florida.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52cbab09-a319-4958-ac8d-cc2f3d06d0dc Fri, 24 May 2024 06:46:37 -0400 The case of the armadillo: Is it spreading leprosy in Florida?
FDA敦促放宽对同性恋和双性恋男性数十年的组织捐赠限制联邦政府在 2020 年和 2023 年改变了可以安全捐献器官和血液的规定，减少了对与另一名男子发生性关系的男子的限制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/FDA-urged-to-relax-decades-old-tissue-donation-restrictions-for-gay-and-bi Sex-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/FDA-urged-to-relax-decades-old-tissue-donation-restrictions-for-gay-and-bi Sex-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92033c29-c5d0-4625-afde-b58441794610 Fri, 24 May 2024 06:43:55 -0400 FDA urged to relax decades-old tissue donation restrictions for gay and bisexual men
《减少通货膨胀法案》将 Medicare D 部分受益人的带状疱疹疫苗接种率提高了 46% 《减少通货膨胀法案》(IRA) 的目标之一是通过取消 Medicare D 部分承保的某些药物和疫苗的费用分摊来降低老年人的医疗保健费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Inflation-Reduction-Act-boosts-shingles-vaccine-uptake-by-4625-for-Medicare-Part-D-recipients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Inflation-Reduction-Act-boosts-shingles-vaccine-uptake-by-4625-for-Medicare-Part-D-recipients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ea317d1-3986-4d49-8631-6e0778e54b6e Thu, 23 May 2024 23:57:00 -0400 Inflation Reduction Act boosts shingles vaccine uptake by 46% for Medicare Part D recipients
使用赛洛西宾会启动大脑中的超连接性，从而产生自我修饰效应一项新的研究表明，裸盖菇素（一种在广为人知的“神奇蘑菇”中发现的化合物）的使用会引发大脑中的一种超连接模式，这种模式与自我修正效应和海洋无边无际的感觉有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Psilocybin-use-initiates-hyperconnectivity-in-the-brain-linked-to-ego-modifying-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Psilocybin-use-initiates-hyperconnectivity-in-the-brain-linked-to-ego-modifying-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1a9c672-fc01-46f6-87d5-1b5363c06ca2 Thu, 23 May 2024 23:48:00 -0400 Psilocybin use initiates hyperconnectivity in the brain linked to ego-modifying effects
综合研究提供了对基因组对神经精神疾病影响的新认识一项新的分析揭示了有关脑细胞遗传变异的详细信息，这可能为精神分裂症和阿尔茨海默病等疾病的靶向治疗开辟新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Compressive-study-provides-new-understands-of-genomic-influences-on-neuropsychiatric-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Compressive-study-provides-new-understands-of-genomic-influences-on-neuropsychiatric-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0662e75-c2bf-408e-b8cf-fae862ccd4b0 Thu, 23 May 2024 23:30:05 -0400 Comprehensive study provides new understandings of genomic influences on neuropsychiatric disease
加重毯子对改善受虐待儿童的睡眠无效休斯顿大学睡眠专家兼心理学教授坎迪斯·阿尔法诺 (Candice Alfano) 的一项研究发现，5 至 10 磅重的毯子并不能改善经历过各种虐待（包括虐待或忽视）的儿童的睡眠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Weighted-blankets-inefficient-for-sleep-improvement-in-maltreatment-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Weighted-blankets-inefficient-for-sleep-improvement-in-maltreatment-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96472f34-35ed-44eb-8dd4-0f13a428bf99 Thu, 23 May 2024 23:23:17 -0400 Weighted blankets ineffective for sleep improvement in maltreated children
体内成像可量化免疫治疗期间临床前黑色素瘤模型中的胶原形态胶原蛋白是细胞外基质的主要成分，在肿瘤的发生发展中起着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/In-vivo-imaging-to-quantify-collagen-morphology-in-preclinical-melanoma-models-during-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/In-vivo-imaging-to-quantify-collagen-morphology-in-preclinical-melanoma-models-during-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c00fc2ac-82d9-4aab-b4a6-0dbc22e38b77 Thu, 23 May 2024 23:16:17 -0400 In-vivo imaging to quantify collagen morphology in preclinical melanoma models during immunotherapy
新发现的神经元类型指导视网膜血管形成多年来，科学家们已经知道，血管晶格可以滋养视网膜中的细胞，使我们能够看到东西，但这种复杂结构是如何形成的一直是个谜。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Newly-discovered-neuron-type-guides-retinal-blood-vessel-formation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Newly-discovered-neuron-type-guides-retinal-blood-vessel-formation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2834439-0a0d-4600-bb3e-014b17f549ce Thu, 23 May 2024 22:54:25 -0400 Newly discovered neuron type guides retinal blood vessel formation
医师与药房整合与癌症患者护理的变化无关药房与医生执业相结合，即在医生执业地点开设现场药房，是癌症治疗的一个日益增长的趋势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Physician-pharmacy-integration-not-linked-with-change-in-the-care-of-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Physician-pharmacy-integration-not-linked-with-change-in-the-care-of-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08f7f6d0-dd05-4a29-90ba-ace185dc0339 Thu, 23 May 2024 22:49:26 -0400 Physician-pharmacy integration not associated with change in the care of cancer patients
新的干细胞移植方法可能会扩大高危血癌患者的供体库迈阿密大学米勒学院西尔维斯特综合癌症中心的研究人员进行的一项研究表明，使用旧药的新治疗方法可能使更多患有高危血癌的患者能够接受来自不相关、部分匹配的捐赠者的移植干细胞。医学和同事。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/New-stem-cell-transplant-approach-may-expand-donor-pool-for-high-risk-blood-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/New-stem-cell-transplant-approach-may-expand-donor-pool-for-high-risk-blood-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd69b7ee-e29e-4164-858b-a43d7a25765f Thu, 23 May 2024 22:36:01 -0400 New stem cell transplant approach may expand donor pool for high-risk blood cancer patients
